text: (he nabee!) aap (mushrikon se) kah den ki mujhe rok diya gaya hai ki main unakee vandana karoon, jinhen tum allaah ke siva pukaarate ho. unase kah do ki main tumhaaree aakaankshaon par nahin chal sakata. mainne aisa kiya to main saty se kupath ho gaya aur main supathon mein se nahin rah jaoonga
